long_description: The Sunday Afternoons Sport hat is the cap for outdoor interests from running and rafting, to water sports and walking. 4 in. crescent shaped brim extends around the head; as brim tapers above ears, a 5 in. rear neck veil begins, offering extended coverage. Water-resistant Supplex(R) nylon provides UPF 50 protection, holding the sun's rays at bay. CoolMax(R) polyester internal sweatband and mesh side panels allow ventilation and moisture release. Chinstrap with cord lock adds security for those blustery days. Features adjustable, pinch-clip nylon closure, floatable brim and a ponytail hole.
short_description: The Sunday Afternoons Sport hat is the cap for outdoor interests from running and rafting, to water sports and walking.
